intro: Psychotria yaoundensis, commonly known as the Cameroon Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to Cameroon and is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves with a glossy surface. The plant produces clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers, which are typically arranged in dense inflorescences. Psychotria yaoundensis is often found in moist, shaded forest understories, thriving in humid tropical environments. Its botanical features make it an important component of the local flora and ecosystem.
